Text: Oñ amo̩ma Isakar e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Tola kpai Pua kpai Jashub kpai Shirmo̩n, e̩le̩ ma che.

Oñ amo̩ma Tola che Uzai kpai Refaya kpai Je̩rie̩l kpai Jameai kpai Ibsam kpai Shemue̩l, abo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef unyi unyi amata-ma ma che, e-Tola, ku ma chʼamagbiti ki nʼuwohi ef o̩gba e-ma: aluka-ma o̩kpanachi Defid che icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyoke meji nyʼulo̩gwa oji.
Amo̩ma Uzai la che Izrahaiya. Oñ amo̩ma Izrahaiya che Maike̩l kpai Obadaya kpai Joe̩l kpai Ishaiya, e̩lu ma che; o̩chaka-ma chʼabo ki tʼoji.
Oñ amanyu ma, o̩gba o̩gba-ma, alu kʼunyi unyi amata-ma de̩ udala udala abʼogu che icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke me̩fa, todu ma nʼamo̩ya kpʼa-mo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ wewe.
Amo̩maye-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ku ma jʼef akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi Isakar, ku ma chʼamagbiti ki nʼuwohi ku ma fʼo̩gba-ma lo nyʼo̩takada, o̩chaka-ma che icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩le̩ nyoke mebie.
E-Be̩njamin che Bila kpai Bike̩r kpai Je̩diee̩l, e̩ta ma che.

Amo̩ma Bila la che E̩zbo̩n kpai Uzai kpai Uzie̩l kpai Je̩rimot kpai Arai, e̩lu ma che; abo ku ma dʼoji dufu unyi unyi amata-ma amagbiti ki nʼuwohi ma che; oñ ma fu ma lo nyʼo̩takada kwʼe̩te̩-ma, aluka-ma che icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyoke meji nyʼogue̩gwa nyoke me̩le̩ oji.
Oñ amo̩ma Bike̩r che Ze̩mira kpai Joash kpai E̩lieza kpai E̩lioenai kpai O̩mri kpai Je̩re̩mo̩t kpai Abaija kpai Anato̩t kpai Alame̩t. Abo-i du chʼamo̩ma Bike̩r.
Oñ ma fu ma lo nyʼo̩takada kwʼe̩te̩-ma, o̩gba o̩gba-ma, abo ku ma dʼoji dufu unyi unyi amata-ma, amagbiti ki nʼuwohi, ma chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ oji.
Amo̩ma Je̩diee̩l la che Bilhan. Oñ amo̩ma Bilhan che Jeush kpai Be̩njamin kpai Ehiud kpai Ke̩neana kpai Zitan kpai Tarshish kpai Ahaishehar.
Abo-i chaka chʼamo̩ma Je̩diee̩l alu kʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu unyi unyi amata-ma de̩, amagbiti ki nʼuwohi, ma che one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwebie nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ oji ku ma neke dufu ef abogu ku ma jogu.
Kpai Shupim ge̩, kpai Hupim, amo̩ma Ir, Hushim amo̩ma Ehe̩r.
Amo̩ma Naftali e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Jazie̩l kpai Guni kpai Jeze̩r kpai Shalum, amo̩ma Bilha.
Amo̩ma Manasa e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che: Azrie̩l, kʼe̩naja-wñ e̩ne̩ Aram Je̩ bi ñw u; i no̩ bi Makir, ata Gilead;
Makir la fʼo̩ya ne̩ ñw Hupim kpai Shupim; odu o̩maye-wñ onobule̩ ko̩ Maaka; odu ekeji-wñ ko Ze̩lo̩fe̩had; Ze̩lo̩fe̩had la nʼamo̩ma onobule̩.
Oñ Maaka, o̩ya Makir fʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bi, oñ i dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Pire̩sh; odu o̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ la ko̩ Shire̩sh; oñ amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Ulam kpai Reke̩m.
Amo̩ma Ulam la che Bidan. Abo-i chʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ e-Gilead, o̩ma Makir o̩ma Manasa.
Oñ Kamole̩ke̩t, o̩maye-wñ onobule̩, fʼIshod kpai Abieze̩r kpai Mahela bi.
Oñ amo̩ma She̩maida che Ahaian kpai Shike̩m kpai Likhai kpai Anaiam.
Oñ amo̩ma Ifraim che, Shutila kpai Bire̩d o̩ma-wñ kpai Tehat o̩ma-wñ, kpai E̩lada o̩ma-wñ, kpai Tehat o̩ma-wñ,
kpai Zebad o̩ma-wñ, kpai Shutila o̩ma-wñ, kpai Ize̩r kpai E̩lead e-kʼaboke̩le̩ Gat ku ma bi ane̩ le̩ mʼu du kpa, todabu ku ma gwo̩ru wa ku ma kʼame̩wñ ukpa-ma.
Ifraim, ata-ma, la deku ma kpo̩kpe̩. Tak amo̩maye-wñ lewa ku ma nyʼe̩ e̩do̩.
Tak i letejefu ugbo o̩ya-wñ, oñ i fefu nyo̩, i la fʼo̩me̩ne̩kele̩ bi, oñ i dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Be̩raya, ukpe̩ kʼe̩bie̩ne̩ wa bʼunyi-wñ ma.
O̩ma-wñ onobule̩ la ko̩ Shira kʼi fu Be̩t-ho̩ro̩n o̩gane̩ kpʼe-ate ko̩ kpai Uze̩n-Shira ge̩.
O̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ la ko̩ Rifa kpai Rishef kpai Tila o̩ma-wñ kpai Tehan o̩ma-wñ.
Leadan o̩ma-wñ, Amihud o̩ma-wñ, E̩lishama o̩ma-wñ,
Nun o̩ma-wñ, Jo̩shua o̩ma-wñ.
Ane̩-ma kpʼodo-ma la che Be̩te̩l kpʼadogbe-wñ, Naaran dʼo̩wo̩ olodudu, Geze̩r kpʼadogbe-wñ jʼo̩wo̩ olane̩-wñ; She̩ke̩m ge̩ kpʼadogbe-wñ gbogbo wa Gaza kpʼadogbe-wñ;
Be̩tshean kpai adogbe-wñ, Taanak kpʼadogbe-wñ, Me̩gido kpʼadogbe-wñ, Do̩r kpʼadogbe-wñ, jo̩ alo̩me̩ amo̩ma Manasa. Amo̩ma Jose̩f o̩ma Israe̩l, dodo o̩mo̩.
Amo̩ma Asha che, Imna kpai Ishfa kpai Ishfai kpai Be̩raya kpai Sira o̩maye-ma onobule̩.
Amo̩ma Be̩raya la che, Hibe̩r kpai Malkie̩l kʼi chʼata Birzee̩t.
Hibe̩r la bi Jafle̩t kpai Sho̩me̩r kpai Hotam kpai Shua o̩maye-ma onobule̩.
Amo̩ma Jafle̩t la che, Pesak kpai Bimhal kpai Ashfat. Amo̩ma Jaflet la jo̩ le̩.
Amo̩ma Shome̩r la che, Ehai kpai Ro̩ga, Je̩huba kpai Aram.
Amo̩ma Hele̩m, o̩maye-wñ la che, Zofa kpai Imna kpai Shile̩sh kpai Emal.
Amo̩ma Zofa che, Sua kpai Hame̩fe̩r kpai Shual kpai Birai kpai Imra,
Bize̩r kpai Ho̩d kpai Shama kpai Shil-sha kpai Itran kpai Bira.
Amo̩ma Jite̩r la che, Je̩fune kpai Pispa kpai Era.
Amo̩ma Ula la che, Era kpai Hanie̩l kpai Rizia.

Abo-i chaka chʼamo̩ma Asha, abo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef unyi amata-ma ma che. Amagbiti kʼo̩la-ma chefe̩ ma che, ma chʼabo ki tʼo̩gba ef amidachi. Oñ aluka-ma du ku ma lo o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu-ma ku ma bʼogu eja jo̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyoke me̩fa.
